abstract_summ: The emergence of the SARS‐CoV‐2 strain of the human coronavirus has thrown the world into the midst of a new pandemic . In the human body, the virus causes COVID‐19, a disease characterized by shortness of breath, fever, and pneumonia, which can be fatal in vulnerable individuals . Across the world, laboratories are developing candidate vaccines for the virus – with vaccine trials underway in the US and UK ‚ and considering various drugs for possible treatments and prophylaxis .
